articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Singapore to block visitors from most South Asian countries - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (Reuters) -     Singapore will block entry to visitors with recent travel history to Bangladesh, Nepal, Pakistan and Sri Lanka from May 2 due to sustained increases in COVID-19 cases in the region, its health ministry said on Friday.
articles.content: SINGAPORE (Reuters) - Singapore will block entry to visitors with recent travel history to Bangladesh, Nepal, Pakistan and Sri Lanka from May 2 due to sustained increases in COVID-19 cases in the reg… [+267 chars]

articles.author: Australian Associated
articles.title: Australia closes sneaky loophole that let travellers get back from India - Daily Mail
articles.description: India's spiralling coronavirus catastrophe prompted Australia to pause all flights from the Asian nation until May 15, but travellers were able to make their way home through Doha.
articles.content:
Australia has slammed shut a loophole that allowed travellers from India to dodge a flight ban through transiting in Qatar.

articles.title: StarHub First In Southeast Asia To Launch NVIDIA GeForce NOW Cloud Gaming Service - Geek Culture
articles.description: StarHub will be the first in Southeast Asia and the only operator in Singapore to launch NVIDIA GeForce Now Cloud Gaming Service.
